title: Bridges Organic Health Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, Catering, Kenyan, African, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A health food restaurant that serves traditional Kenyan cuisine prepared with organically grown produce, since 2006. Sources its organic produce from members of the Kenya Organic Agricultural Network. Vegans please inquire about options and inform HappyCow.
streetAddress: Tubman Rd, Upperhill Food Court, Upperhill
